contact.hero.title: Let's talk about technology in your business
contact.hero.subtitle: Tired of unreliable freelancers and expensive agencies? Looking for a partner who understands your business, not just writes code?
contact.benefits.title: What can you expect?
contact.benefits.item1.title: Concrete, no jargon
contact.benefits.item1.desc: I speak the language of business, not technical jargon.
contact.benefits.item2.title: Initial diagnosis
contact.benefits.item2.desc: I will point out possible directions during the first conversation.
contact.benefits.item3.title: No obligations
contact.benefits.item3.desc: A conversation is not a contract. Let's see if we are a good fit.
